home.title: Who are we?
home.mission: transforming the Romanian rural space into an inclusive one, ideal for the personal and professional development of young people
home.vision: social inclusion and youth development can be achieved through formal, non-formal education and through exchanges of experiences
home.about: ASTRID arose from the desire to contribute to increasing opportunities and the development of young people in villages. We concentrate our activity mainly in the villages near Cluj-Napoca
